transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_172337.1 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000408990.7. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.

transcript.long_name: OTX2 antisense RNA 1 (head to head), transcript variant 2
OTX2 antisense RNA 1 (head to head), transcript variant 1

annotation_set.comment: Annotation is based on Ensembl release 96 (GRCh38 primary assembly)

source.name: List of locus specific databases for OTX2
